    • saveTopicUnhide

      public void saveTopicUnhide(Object topicUnhide, Integer hideTagType, Long point, String consumption_userName, Object consumption_pointLogObject, String income_userName, Object income_pointLogObject, BigDecimal consumption_amount, BigDecimal userShare_amount, Object consumption_paymentLogObject, Object income_paymentLogObject, TopicUnhidePlatformShare topicUnhidePlatformShare)
      保存'话题取消隐藏'
      指定者:
      saveTopicUnhide 在接口中 TopicService
      参数:
      topicUnhide -
      hideTagType - 隐藏标签类型
      point - 积分
      consumption_userName - 消费用户名称
      consumption_pointLogObject - 消费积分日志
      income_userName - 收入用户名称
      income_pointLogObject - 收入积分日志
      consumption_amount - 消费金额
      userShare_amount - 用户分成金额
      income_paymentLogObject - 用户收入金额日志
      topicUnhidePlatformShare - 平台分成
      consumption_paymentLogObjec - 用户消费金额日志
